[[inst_c_slli]]
==== C.SLLI

*Syntax:* c.slli t#1, uimm, ->t

*Description:* Compressed instruction variant (16-bit encoding).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_c_slli.svg[C.SLLI encoding,width=800]

*Uop-Class:* ALU

*Compression:* C16 (len=16)

*Uop-Class payload:* `{"alu_kind": "SHIFT", "note": "C.TINST split", "source": "override", "uop_kind": "ALU"}`
